title: Web Interface Not Loading
body:
## Step 1: Have you search for this issue before posting it?

I have search about my error and couldn't find a solution.

## Step 2: Describe your environment

* OS : Windows
* Python Version: 3.8.10
* Branch: Master

## Step 3: Describe the problem:
 
After installing OctoBot with python commands web interface doesn't work.

It's expected that web interface auto-launch after running the program.

### Steps to reproduce:

Install Octobot with python command:
- python3.8 -m pip install OctoBot>=0.4.0b
Run Octobot with:
- OctoBot

Console log displays following message:

2022-08-18 10:17:01,760 ERROR    TentacleLoader       Error when loading web_interface: ImportError (cannot import name 'parse_rule' from 'werkzeug.routing' (d:\programacion\p_scripts\octobot\2\venv\lib\site-packages\werkzeug\routing\__init__.py)). If this error persists, try reinstalling your tentacles via "python start.py tentacles --install --all".

2022-08-18 10:17:01,766 ERROR    TentacleLoader       Error when loading web_notifier: ImportError (cannot import name 'parse_rule' from 'werkzeug.routing' (d:\programacion\p_scripts\octobot\2\venv\lib\site-packages\werkzeug\routing\__init__.py)). If this error persists, try reinstalling your tentacles via "python start.py tentacles --install --all".

Fixed the error reinstalling werkzeug package with:

pip install Werkzeug==2.1.2

Tried other versions until finding the lastest not showing the error.
